question: Who among the following has been mentioned as Maharajadhiraja and a Lion to the Huna Deer by Banabhatta?
explanation: Prabhakaravardhana was a king of Thanesar in northern India around the time of the decline of the Gupta Empire. Banabhatta credits Prabhakaravardhana with a strong stance against the Hunas, describing him as:"A lion to the Huna deer‚Äù.
